DOC.brief_summary: The objective trial : 1. ass feasibility safety perform SILS™ Port Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy 2. monitor compare outcomes SILS™ Port Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy versus 4PLC objectively document scientific merit perceive advantage SILS™ Port Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy .
DOC.brief_title: SILS™ Port Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy Post Market Study
DOC.criteria: Between 18 85 year old . Patient diagnosis biliary colic document gallstone polyp image Biliary dyskinesia document EF < 30 % . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 45 kg/m2 . Any female patient , pregnant , suspected pregnant , nursing . Any patient acute calculus acalculous cholecystitis . Any patient upper midline right sub costal incision . Any patient preoperative indication cholangiogram . Any patient ASA > 3 normal liver function . Any patient undergoing Peritoneal Dialysis ( PD ) . Any patient unrepaired umbilical hernia prior umbilical hernia repair .
